publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-5448 Mr Jamie Stone: Cleaner Toilets on Trains—That the Parliament supports all moves to encourage more people to travel by train; believes that, to be successful, rail travel must be attractive and reliable; notes, however, that on far too many trains in Scotland toilet facilities fall short of the standards required, and urges the train operating companies to improve the maintenance and regular cleaning of toilets on their trains. Supported by: Donald Gorrie*

S2M-5448 Mr Jamie Stone: Cleaner Toilets on Trains—That the Parliament supports all moves to encourage more people to travel by train; believes that, to be successful, rail travel must be attractive and reliable; notes, however, that on far too many trains in Scotland toilet facilities fall short of the standards required, and urges the train operating companies to improve the maintenance and regular cleaning of toilets on their trains. Supported by: Donald Gorrie
S2M-5448 Cleaner Toilets on Trains (lodged on 23 January 2007) Nora Radcliffe*
S2M-5448 Cleaner Toilets on Trains (lodged on 23 January 2007) John Farquhar Munro*
S2M-5448 Cleaner Toilets on Trains (lodged on 23 January 2007) Linda Fabiani*

S2M-5448 Mr Jamie Stone: Cleaner Toilets on Trains—That the Parliament supports all moves to encourage more people to travel by train; believes that, to be successful, rail travel must be attractive and reliable; notes, however, that on far too many trains in Scotland toilet facilities fall short of the standards required, and urges the train operating companies to improve the maintenance and regular cleaning of toilets on their trains. Supported by: Donald Gorrie, Nora Radcliffe, John Farquhar Munro, Linda Fabiani
